messages.message:
Update on Cypress-cyp env... starting yesterday, core-platform-service has been restarting a lot, which causes Cypress tests to slow down/timeout/fail (thread (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C073F3T5KRQ/p1750709889580189)). @Abhinav found that CPS is OOM-killed. From various logs/grpc failures, the `GetMountPoints` grpc endpoint is likely the cause of this. I have a fix PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71633) for it.
This endpoint is not performant, and it gets called whenever users visit the home page :sweat:

The good thing is that Cypress-cyp has so many orgs & drives, so the performance issue surfaces :blob-bear-dance:
